title: Another Year of Outstanding Development Engineering and InFEWS Doctoral Graduates
author: Tamara Straus
excerpt:
Now in its sixth year, the Development Engineering PhD program enables UC Berkeley doctoral students from engineering and social science fields to pursue applied technological research in low-resource regions around the world. The InFEWS—Innovations at the Nexus of Food, Water, and Energy Systems—Fellowship, as part of this doctoral program, enables students to work with and … Continue reading "Another Year of Outstanding Development Engineering and InFEWS Doctoral Graduates"
